app


  1. Identify the boundary.\[x=70.9\]Get the z score.\[z=\frac{x-\mu}{\sigma}=0.18\]With \(z\)-table, determine \(P(Z<0.18)=0.5714\)
  2. Identify the boundary.\[\sum x=6924\]Calculate the standard error (of total)\[\text{SE} = \sigma\sqrt{n}=50\]Get the z score.\[z=\frac{\sum x-n\mu}{\text{SE}}=-1.52\]With \(z\)-table, determine \(P(Z<-1.52)=0.0643\)
  3. Identify the boundary.\[\sum x=3398\]Calculate the standard error (of total)\[\text{SE} = \sigma\sqrt{n}=35\]Get the z score.\[z=\frac{\sum x-n\mu}{\text{SE}}=-0.91\]With \(z\)-table, determine \(P(Z>-0.91)=0.8186\)
  4. Identify the boundary.\[x=76.6\]Get the z score.\[z=\frac{x-\mu}{\sigma}=1.32\]With \(z\)-table, determine \(P(Z>1.32)=0.0934\)
  5. Identify the boundary.\[\bar{x}=71.05\]Calculate the standard error (of mean)\[\text{SE} = \frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}=0.83333\]Get the z score.\[z=\frac{\bar{x}-\mu}{\text{SE}}=1.26\]With \(z\)-table, determine \(P(Z<1.26)=0.8962\)
  6. Identify the boundary.\[\bar{x}=70.19\]Calculate the standard error (of mean)\[\text{SE} = \frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}=0.45455\]Get the z score.\[z=\frac{\bar{x}-\mu}{\text{SE}}=0.42\]With \(z\)-table, determine \(P(Z>0.42)=0.3372\)
